name: 𝐑𝐄𝐃𝐇𝐎𝐎𝐃 𝐌𝐃 𝐁𝐎𝐓
description: WhatsApp Bot Base using Baileys. Written in javascript developed by lordkay tech

PREFIX.description: put any one symbol here except @ and + , leave it Blank if you want to use multiple prefix

statusview.description: make it true if you want bot to view status

autoRead.description: make it true if you want bot to read messages

antidelete.description: bot will forward deleted messages if you make it true

OWNER_NAME.description: owner name of the bot or Your Name
